page.title: 05EDUCATION IN COBHAM SURREY
page.content: Cobham has the range of Nursery, First, Middle, Secondary and Private schools.{ {NURSERY,}private, 30 children, 3 years up, educational toys, language and number. No lunch provided. {FIRST,}184 children, 7 classes, 5-8 years, one Head, 6 full time staff, two part time. No corporal punishment. Lunchtime clubs. School lunches provided, cost 63p. Language - "360 Scheme". Uniform brown and yellow. {MIDDLE,}230 children, 8 classes, 2 for each year, 8-12 years, 1 Head, 8 full time staff, 3 part time. No corporal punishment by staff, slipper by Head. French in 4th year. English "360 Scheme". SMP maths scheme. Netball and football teams winter, cricket summer. Day outings in years, 4th year trip to France. Uniform blue and white.
